text-decoration:underline;" onclick=ShowHide(1817020);>Show Shuttle Bus Stops</a></b></font>                           [TP]<div id="1817020"; style="display:none;"><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=3 rules=rows frame=hsides><br><tr><td bgcolor=FAF8CC><b>Station</b><td bgcolor=FAF8CC><b>Shuttle Bus Stop<br></b><tr><td>Queensboro Plaza  [7] <td>Queens Plaza South at station entrance<br><tr><td>39 Av<td>31 St at 39 Av<br><tr><td>36 Av<td>31 St at 36 Av<br><tr><td>Broadway<td>31 St at Broadway<br><tr><td>30 Av<td>31 St at 30 Av<br><tr><td rowspan=2>Astoria Blvd<td>31 St at Astoria Blvd (to Ditmars Blvd)<br><tr><td>31 St at Hoyt Av North (to Queensboro Plaza)<br><tr><td>Ditmars Blvd<td>31 St at Ditmars Blvd</table></div></html><br><br><b><i>Alternate travel note:<br></b></i></font>For LaGuardia Airport take the <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/q070scur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Q70 SBS</font></a> via transfer at 61 St-Woodside [7] <br>or 74 St-Roosevelt Av [7] [E] [F] [R].<br><br><b>Reminder:</b> 30 Av and 36 Av are closed for renovation.<br><b><br>

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[R] Trains skip 5 Av/59 St, Lexington Av/59 St and Queens Plaza in both directions</b><a href=http://advisory.mtanyct.info/pdf_files/ServiceGuide.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Weekend</font></a>, Saturday <i>and</i> Sunday, Mar 31 - Apr 1<br><br>[R] trains run in both directions between 57 St-7 Av [Q] and 21 St-Queensbridge [F], making stops at Lexington Av/63 St and Roosevelt Island, resuming normal service at 36 St, Queens.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  width=80%><tr><td><font size=3><b>Travel Alternatives</b><td align=right>[TP]</table><br>For <b>5 Av/59 St</b> and <b>Lexington Av/59 St</b>, use nearby <a href=http://web.mta.info/weekender/tileMap.html?staID=10254 target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>5 Av/53 St</font></a> <b>[E]</b>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/weekender/tileMap.html?staID=10253 target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Lexington Av/53 St</font></a> <b>[E]</b> or <br><a href=http://web.mta.info/weekender/tileMap.html?staID=18190 target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>59 St</font></a> <b>[4] [5] [6]</b> stations.<br><br>For <b>Queens Plaza</b>, take the <b>[E]</b> instead.<br><br> Transfer between <b>[R] </b>and <b>[4] [5] [6] </b>trains at 14 St-Union Sq.<br> </font>Transfer between <b>[R] </b>and <b>[E] </b>trains at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority or Roosevelt Av.<br> </font>Transfer between <b>[E] </b>and<b> [6] </b>trains at 51 St-Lexington Av/53 St.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td>  [ad]  <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>

LongDescription: <b><i>ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn</b>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Mar 30 - Apr 2<br><br>Trains stop at 36 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a <br><i>local</i> Manhattan-bound [F]* [N] or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [F] [N] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer <br>to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 45 St and 53 St, take the [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [N] <i>local</i> or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br></i><b><br>
